alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:23PM CDT until April 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bonne Terre to near Bismarck, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Farmington, Festus, Bonne Terre, De Soto, Desloge, Crystal City, Ste. Genevieve, Bismarck, Leadwood, Park Hills, Olympian Village, Iron Mountain Lake, Bloomsdale, St. Mary, Knob Lick, Iron Mountain, Weingarten, Womac, Rocky Ridge, and Coffman. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 141 and 174. This also includes St. Joe State Park, St. Francois State Park, Hawn State Park, Felix Valle House State Park, and Missouri Mines Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Illinois...and southeastern and east central Missouri.
